message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling more generous than 60-40, but the clock is ticking!
Come on Bob, 58-42 is more than fair considering the inflation!
The deal's getting worse for you Alice, not me.  Take 4800 before it shrinks even more!
I'm not giving up yet, 56-44 is still a good deal, considering I'm losing value fast!
